channel.title: Physical/Limited Edition release?
channel.description:
Hello!
I am sorry if this has been discussed before but I was wondering if there are any words from the developers about the possibility of making a limited edition (physical disc) available for fans once the game is complete?
I already have bought the digital copy but I think it would be nice to have a collectible item and perhaps this would also be a token of appreciation for the team?
Thanks!

item.title: Physical/Limited Edition release?
item.dc:creator: CatzEyes93
item.description:
I love this idea. I would put it right next to my Half Life CD disk from 1999.

Read full topic
